publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3803 Hugh Henry: The Draft Police Act 1997 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Police Act 1997 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*

S2M-3803 Hugh Henry: The Draft Police Act 1997 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Police Act 1997 Amendment (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson
